entry.title: CUNY 2016
entry.id: tag:sollago.github.io,2016-03-03:On March 3, Anna Stutter and me will be presenting a poster in Gainesville: "Cross-linguistic variation in sensitivity to grammatical errors: evidence from multilingual speakers" [[abstract]](/pubs/CUNY16_abstract.pdf).html

entry.title: New Paper
entry.id: tag:sollago.github.io,2015-07-01:Part of my Ph.D. work was published in the *Journal of Memory and Language*: “Agreement attraction in Spanish comprehension” [[pdf]](/pubs/Lago_etal_SpanishAgreement_2015.pdf).html
